data.what_is: All in one marketing communication. Email marketing, SMS and mobile marketing, direct mail marketing and the ability to send letters digitally. An intuitive drag and drop UI with the ability to split test, test for devices and manage users, credit and invoices. Emails, email newsletters and surveys are all UNLIMITED in volume and can be set to send automatically based on clicks on links, opens or activity in your CRM system.
data.product_description: Suppliers of unlimited, automated emails combined with surveys, SMS, direct mail and the ability to send letters digitally. Named 5th Fastest Growing Tech Business by Deloitte.

initial_reviews.review_title: Marketing techniques you'll need for your business
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about BriefYourMarket.com?
This website helps you get your ads and promotions in order. Makes your business marketing way easier and effective. It is easy to set up and help is always there through the process. There is always updates and you are aware of the improvements.

What do you dislike about BriefYourMarket.com?
There is only one cost for everything. Maybe offering some packages or some sales once in a while , that would help small businesses. There is automated responses that would be better if there was a real response to a questions, no big deal of a problem. Other than these things , it is a great website.

Recommendations to others considering BriefYourMarket.com:
Enjoyed the website, easy to use.

What problems is BriefYourMarket.com solving and how is that benefiting you?
This website has helped solve the issue of hiring different people for different types of promotions, instead it is all in one place. The benefits include having someone with a marketing background guide you through the steps.
